author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- Made the static members constexpr and declared storage for them.
- This fixed a problem uncovered by the UBSAN build.
#### PR validation:

The code compiles and buids using the CMSSW_11_0_UBSAN_X_2019-06-21-2300 IB.
title: Fixed static members in HGCalConcentratorBestChoiceImpl
